test-case.name: createMultipleSoftwareModuleTypes
test-case.description: Verfies that multiple types are created as requested.

test-case.name: updateNothingResultsInUnchangedRepositoryForType
test-case.description: Calling update without changing fields results in no recorded change in the repository including unchanged audit fields.

test-case.name: entityQueriesReferringToNotExistingEntitiesThrowsException
test-case.description: Verifies that management queries react as specfied on calls for non existing entities by means of throwing EntityNotFoundException.

test-case.name: createSoftwareModuleTypesFailsWithExistingEntity
test-case.description: Verfies that it is not possible to create a list of types where one already exists.

test-case.name: deleteAssignedAndUnassignedSoftwareModuleTypes
test-case.description: Tests the successfull deletion of software module types. Both unused (hard delete) and used ones (soft delete).

test-case.name: updateSoftareModuleTypeFieldsToNewValue
test-case.description: Calling update for changed fields results in change in the repository.

test-case.name: createSoftwareModuleTypeFailsWithExistingEntity
test-case.description: Verfies that it is not possible to create a type that alrady exists.

test-case.name: createSoftwareModuleTypesFailsWithInvalidMaxAssignment
test-case.description: Verifies that the creation of a softwareModuleType is failing because of invalid max assignment

test-case.name: createModuleTypesCallFailsForExistingTypes
test-case.description: Create Software Module Types call fails when called for existing entities.

test-case.name: findSoftwareModuleTypeByName
test-case.description: Checks that software module typeis found based on given name.

test-case.name: nonExistingEntityAccessReturnsNotPresent
test-case.description: Verifies that management get access reacts as specfied on calls for non existing entities by means of Optional not present.
